tetra/schematic/sword/stiletto_blade.des:
Replace the current sword blade with a stiletto blade. Not to be confused with the high heel stilettoes.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.sword/stiletto_blade.name: Stiletto
tetra.module.sword/stiletto_blade.descri: A sharp, piercing dagger. Not the shoe.
tetra/schematic/sword/straight_guard.des:
Craft a straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
 
Material §fhardness§r and §fflexibility§r increases the armor amount.
tetra.module.sword/straight_guard.name: Straight guard
tetra.module.sword/straight_guard.descri: A straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/straight_guar:
Craft a straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
 
Material §fhardness§r and §fflexibility§r increases the armor amount.
tetra.module.greatsword/straight_guard.d: A straight guard that protects the hand of the user.
tetra/schematic/sword/chillrend_blade.de: An icy blade than can freeze opponents solid.
tetra.module.sword/chillrend_blade.name: Chillrend
tetra.module.sword/chillrend_blade.descr: An icy blade hailing from land where the mountian rims meet the sky.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/longsword_bla:
Replace the current sword blade with a longsword blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
A longsword, a robust dual-handed blade.
tetra/schematic/greatsword/claymore_blad:
Replace the current sword blade with a claymore blade.
 
Material §fhardness§r increases §fdamage§r.
tetra.module.greatsword/claymore_blade.d: A claymore, a powerful and distinct blade.
